ygData.subject: Re: Exp. and Loot for a 34 Ranger
ygData.msgSnippet: At 34 I was killing chickens in Overthere... It s not the most fun, but you can rack up the Exp pretty quick. It seems like OOT was really when groups
ygData.messageBody:
At 34 I was killing chickens in Overthere... It's
not the most fun, but you can rack up the Exp pretty
quick. <br><br>It seems like OOT was really when groups
started to take on the advanced level
characteristics...People were figuring out how to chain pull with a
chanter mezzing, cleric healing and the all too popular
shout "Donating for Exp Rez" is heard occasionally
throughout the zone.<br><br><br>As for me, I would
concentrate on finding a good place to fear kite. I recently
re-discovered this little trick and leveled from 46 to 49 in
Emerald Jungle in about a week (playing about 5 hours a
night).<br><br>Cya<br>Tetzu
